document_data.name: Abbey of the Rose
document_data.mainbody: The '''Abbey of the Rose''' was a secret temple to [[Amaunator]] in [[shadovar]]-dominated [[Sembia]] in the mid-to-late 15{{th}} century [[DR]]. Former, however, the site was sacred to [[Mask]].
document_data.Location: It was located in a valley in the [[Thunder Peaks]], near the river [[Draal]] before it joined the river [[Arkhen]], east of the [[Thunder Peaks]].
document_data.Defenses: The abbey was protected by the spirits of [[Elgrin Fau]], led by [[Avnon Des]].
document_data.History: However, in the {{yearlinkName|1484}}, the [[Oracle]] released the spirits and so [[Sayeed]] and [[Zeeahd]] invaded the Abbey with their pack of [[spined devil]]s.
